archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0648
archimate:Requirement.documentation: The Collections solution shall enable customer accounts to be allocated to profiles based on customer characteristics Including: 1. Demographics 2. Risk profile – based on VF history inc. prior Collections treatments (e.g. number of PTP / PE honoured/dishonoured) 3. Credit score 4. Current Collections status 5. Special Collections status

properties.value: What do you mean by "Demographics", "PTP", "PE"? Demographics: where do customer come frome, age, whats is credit score PTP - Promise to Pay PE - Payment Extensions VFNZ AP: Which system should determine customer profile. VFNZ is using profiling engine to determine profile. Solution 1: Comarch integrates with existing engine Solution 2: Comarch develop new engine - maybe not needed if no change in calculation rules are planned? VFNZ AP: Please deliver samples of rules that are used in profiling process + can you please deliver sample values for profiles? Is it just a number (0-x) or name pre-defined name of the profile?
